title: Got Losses? A Tax Break Could Soothe the Pain
text:
Uncle Samâ€™s tax rules on deducting investment losses can ease the sting of market declines. But they contain traps for the unwary.
Some investors cope with the turmoil by selling poor-performing positions and using the losses to offset taxes on any capital gains.
